item.title: Quick Lemon Garlic Shrimp and Asparagus for Family
item.description: Enjoy a quick and flavorful Lemon Garlic Shrimp and Asparagus dish that brings coastal flavors to your kitchen. Perfect for impressing family and friends with minimal effort.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined
  • 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed
  • 3 tablespoons olive oil
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 lemon, juiced
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
  2. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© for about 1 minute until fragrant.
  3. Add shrimp and asparagus to the skillet.
  4. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until shrimp are pink and asparagus is tender.
  5. Squeeze lemon juice over the dish and season with salt and pepper.
  6. Serve immediately.
